evidence.text: The Challenged Directives as a whole are arbitrary and capricious in violation of 5 U.S.C. §706(2)(A). Thus, the Challenged Directives as a whole are void, illegal, and of no force and effect and are hereby vacated and set aside pursuant to §706(2).

extracted.value: The Challenged Directives as a whole are arbitrary and capricious in violation of 5 U.S.C. §706(2)(A). Thus, the Challenged Directives as a whole are void, illegal, and of no force and effect and are hereby vacated and set aside pursuant to §706(2).

evidence.text: The Resulting Grant Terminations are arbitrary and capricious in violation of 5 U.S.C. §706(2)(A). Thus, the Resulting Grant Terminations are void, illegal, and of no force and effect, and are hereby vacated and set aside pursuant to §706(2).

extracted.value: The Resulting Grant Terminations are arbitrary and capricious in violation of 5 U.S.C. §706(2)(A). Thus, the Resulting Grant Terminations are void, illegal, and of no force and effect, and are hereby vacated and set aside pursuant to §706(2).

evidence.text: Judgment shall enter in favor of plaintiffs and against defendants on Count 3 of the Amended Complaint.

extracted.value: Judgment shall enter in favor of plaintiffs and against defendants on Count 3 of the Amended Complaint.

evidence.text: The Court retains jurisdiction to enforce this judgment.

extracted.value: The Court retains jurisdiction to enforce this judgment.
